posts.content:
RHD 1964 Splitscreen Camper

Offers Invited, currently on sale for £26,500.

Previously valued at £28,000 by SSVC.

Price has been lowered to £26,500 for a couple of months but no interest so far.

Currently gathering dust in the garage despite being ready to use with MOT until June 2020 so offers invited to give this a good home.

Solid bus with only surface rust here and there, easy to remedy just needs that little bit of Time / TLC.

Any questions please contact me. 07906060552 Lloyd.
interested if you'd come down 20% - pm me....

xcentric, I did PM twice yesterday, but messages stuck in Outbox, I have contacted admin but my mobile is 07906060552 if you could text me as I am not sure what the problem is there. Also, would you be able to see the van this weekend as i am away for the next 2. thanks, Lloyd.

Harries wrote: ↑Sat Aug 17, 2019 7:54 am xcentric, I did PM twice yesterday, but messages stuck in Outbox, I have contacted admin but my mobile is 07906060552 if you could text me as I am not sure what the problem is there. Also, would you be able to see the van this weekend as i am away for the next 2. thanks, Lloyd.
The messages sit in your outbox until the person reads them, then they go to your sent items, that way you know they have been read.
ah, i did not realise, assumed my error somehow, was driving me mad - Thanks for that
